document.text:
From: 
To:'
(USANYS)"  
)"   
Subject: RE: Maxwell 
Suppression Opp 
Date: Wed, 17 Feb 2021 00:10:31 +0000 
Attachments: Motion to Suppress_Opp_y3 Jpost KM edits).docx _ _ _ _ 
Here is an updated draft poster review. I have left in one of his comments for your reaction. I just made it double-
spaced and it is quite long, so as you are reviewing, any thoughts on where to cut would be much appreciated. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, February 15, 2021 11:41 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Maxwell Suppression Opp 
Thanks! I should be able to look at this tomorrow evening, so let me know if MI has reviewed before then. Otherwise, 
I'll look at this draft. 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Monday, February 15, 2021 1:51 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: Maxwell Suppression Opp 
Hey — Hope you have been able to enjoy the long weekend! Here is what I sent M. I don't think he has reviewed yet 
and not sure what your timing is looking like, but figured I would forward. (Also happy to send to you once MI has had a 
chance to review) 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Friday, February 12, 2021 4:25 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Maxwell Suppression Opp 
Thanks so much, M. My apologies again for its length. I welcome all of your feedback, including where to trim this; if 
the order in which I addressed her various arguments makes sense; and the due process points. Hopefully I didn't miss 
the mark too badly on this! Thanks again. 
From: (USANYS)
Sent: Friday, February 12, 2021 2:06 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Maxwell Suppression Opp 
Sure. 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Friday, February 12, 2021 2:05 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: Maxwell Suppression Opp 
EFTA00021364

Thanks again for all of your time over the past couple of weeks. I was hoping to send you my Maxwell opposition this 
afternoon for your review given all of your incredibly helpful feedback and expertise in this area. It's on the lengthier side 
given the complicated facts and the many arguments they made so my apologies in advance. I'm aiming to send it to my 
chiefs early next week if at all possible, but totally understand if not. Happy to discuss. 
M 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
EFTA00021365
